Tayshaun Prince added 26 points and 11 rebounds for the Pistons, who had lost their first two games since acquiring Allen Iverson from Denver last week for All-Star point guard Chauncey Billups , key reserve Antonio McDyess and Cheikh Samb . Paid Clicks increased 18 percent for the company in the quarter, while cost-per click increased 4 percent. Google said that international revenues totaled$ 4.38 billion, 52 percent of total revenue for the quarter. Our strong performance has been driven by a rapidly growing digital economy, continuous product innovation that benefits both users and advertisers, and by the extraordinary momentum of our newer businesses, such as display and mobile, said Eric Schmidt , CEO of Google. SAN FRANCISCO( Reuters)- Chrysler Group LLC's chief executive apologized on Saturday for describing the high-interest bailout loans extended by the U.S. and Canadian governments in 2009 as "shyster loans." Yesterday, in responding to a question about Chrysler's government loans, I used a term in reference to the interest rate being charged on our government loans that has raised concern, CEO Sergio Marchionne said in a statement. "I regret the remark which I consider inappropriate." Shyster is a derogatory term used to describe an unprincipled lawyer or politician. He used the term at least
